name: Demeco LMG
description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: LMG
Class: Energy (Laser)
Battery Size: 100
Rate Of Fire: 400 rpm
Effective Range: 40 m
Attachments: Optics (S2), Barrel (S2), Underbarrel (S3)
Klaus & Werner has created an iconic weapon with tried and true Demeco laser LMG. Used extensively in military engagements, this short-to-mid-range infantry favorite has been constructed with stability and accuracy at the forefront.
description_cn:
制造商：克劳斯&韦纳(Klaus & Werner)
物品类型：轻机枪
类别：能量 (激光)
电池容量：100
射速：400 rpm
有效射程：40 米
附件：瞄具 (S2)，枪管 (S2)，下挂 (S3)
克劳斯&韦纳创造出来的德美科激光轻机枪是一个标志性的武器，其以久经考验而闻名于世。它被广泛用于各种军事作战中，特别受到那些执行中短距离作战的步兵所喜欢。因为它在构建时便确保处于前线时仍有出色的准确和稳定度。
